room_title: Escape room "One Eyed Willie’s Treasure Hunt" by Expired Time in Findlay
room_description:
One-Eyed Willie set sail aboard his pirate ship to search for the lost treasure of Keystone Island. After months out to sea, he discovered the treasure that contained many jewels and doubloons. After stowing away his booty and setting many booby traps along the way to protect it, he set sail to return to his homeland of Astoria. Before he would make it back home, his ship was attacked, and One-Eyed Willie was captured. His captors tied up Willie in hopes of finding the treasure on board. Without any luck and no help from Willie, they did not find his hidden treasure and left Willie to die aboard his ship.

Those who dare to enter his ship to find the treasure have 60 minutes to complete their task before the ghost of Willie returns and makes ye scallywags walk the plank! Do you have what it takes to find the treasure before you end up in Davy Jones’ Locker?
